scenes.background: Monica shifts in her seat, glancing at Bob with concern.
scenes.description: Monica says, If we keep rushing, we might overlook important details. Whats your take?

options.text: We should strike a balance, ensuring thoroughness without losing momentum.
options.analysis: You propose a balanced approach, showing good perception and empathy while maintaining social harmony.

options.text: You're right, Monica. We need to slow down and ensure we cover all bases.
options.analysis: You support Monica's concern, showing good self-regulation but less emphasis on motivation and perception.

options.text: I think we need to keep moving forward and address details as they come.
options.analysis: You lean towards maintaining momentum, showing good social skills and motivation but less empathy and perception.
